post:
VPSVille is now offering a 25% lifetime discount on new sign-ups until January 24, 2009!
Don't miss this incredible opportunity to locate in Canada's largest datacenter at a great price!

Purchase any VPS plan with the coupon code VS25 and recieve a lifetime 25% discount!. Offer expires January 24, 2009.

Get your new VPS on our enterprise grade rackmount hardware. Quad-core SuperMicro Xeons with 3Ware RAID, dual power supplies,
dual NIC's and dual switching. We do not host your valuable data on consumer grade equipment!

All of our VPS's enjoy the following features:

  • Stellar 24/7 Support. We are married to our Blackberries!
  • Fast connection and low latency to your customers over a premium Peer1 network link.
  • 100% Uptime! Fully redundant Cisco network infrastructure with HSRP.
  • All servers located in Downtown Toronto at 151 Front St. West.
  • Enterprise grade servers with SuperMicro motherboards, Seagate disks, ECC memory and 3Ware RAID controllers.
  • 30 day satisfaction guarantee.
  • 100mbit internet uplink.
  • We do not oversell disk, cpu or memory resources.
Terms:

  • These discounts apply to the packages listed in this posting, including cPanel, DirectAdmin, LxAdmin and Semi-Dedicated Megacity plans.
  • Available for NEW order only. (For new and existing customers.)
  • Coupon code must be supplied at time of order.
  • All prices in Canadian dollars and include all applicable taxes.
  • We accept Interac Online, Visa, MC, Paypal and Moneybookers as payment options.
All plans come loaded with:

+ Quad Xeon CPU nodes
+ 3Ware RAID Disks
+ Full root access
+ CentOS Based
+ Instant free setup
+ Instant upgrades

cPanel + WHM Plans
cPanel/WHM VPS
+ Fully managed
+ Preinstalled with DNS, Apache, MySQL, PHP, email + anti-virus + anti-spam.
+ 25% off with coupon VS25
[Details]

VPSVille Gives You:

  • Guaranteed uptime - we put our money where our mouth is!
  • Money back satisfaction guarantee!
  • No setup fee's!
  • Instant fully automated setup!
  • Custom control panel to control your server.
  • Self-managed backups.
  • Self-managed upgrades or downgrades.
  • Emergency 24/7 support.
  • Enterprise Quad Core Servers.
  • Self-managed and reseller package options.
Downtown Toronto Data Center, Located at 151 Front St. West

Latency (ping) Test: 76.74.137.1
